title: The Round Earth
description: The Round Earth is an informative book that presents proof that Earth is round by using the scientific method. Students will have the opportunity to learn about early observations by Greek philosophers, such as Aristotle and Eratosthenes, as well as practical proof from the modern age. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine main idea and details and the various uses of parentheses.
